Button: Primary

  • HTML
  • View

  • Info
  • Notes 
<a class="button button--primary " href="#">Click me!</a>
 
{% set attributes = attributes ? attributes : create_attribute() %}

{% set classes = [
  'button',
  style ? 'button--' ~ style : '',
]|merge(classes|default([''])) %}

<a {{attributes.addClass(classes) }} href="{{ url }}">
  {{- text -}}
</a>
 
{
  "text": "Click me!",
  "url": "#",
  "style": "primary"
}
  • Content: 
    .button {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-accent-dark);
  border: solid 1px var(--color-primary-accent-dark);
  color: var(--color-primary-accent-light);
  display: inline-block;
  line-height: 1.1;
  margin: 0.5rem 0 0 0;
  padding: 0.4rem 1.2rem;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.button + .button {
  margin-left: 1rem;
}

.button--secondary {
  background-color: #000;
  border-color: #000;
  color: #fff;
}
